articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Apple releases public betas of all next-gen OS updates, except for VisionOS - Ars Technica
articles.description: Apple's public betas are usually stable enough for daily use, but be careful.
articles.content:
12
Apple's next-generation operating systems are taking their next step toward release today: Apple is issuing the first public beta builds of iOS 18, iPadOS 18, macOS 15 Sequoia, tvOS 18, and HomeP… [+3134 chars]
